instructions.1: Separate biscuits and arrange about 2 inches apart on an ungreased baking sheet.
instructions.2: In a small frying pan, melt butter over medium heat. Stir in paprika; remove from heat. Brush butter mixture over tops of biscuits. Sprinkle evenly with cheese.
instructions.3: Bake in a 375 degrees F oven until biscuits are golden brown (12 to 15 minutes). Serve hot.

questions.question: In Step 2, is the biscuits from Step 1 being used?
Is biscuits from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is paprika from Step 2 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the biscuits in Step 3?
Can we separate (Step 1) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
